decision_conditions: Condition : 1 - The development hereby permitted shall be begun before the expiration of three years from the date of this permission.

Condition : 2 - The proposed development shall be carried out in all respects in accordance with the proposals contained in the application and the plans submitted ( BSP/52/100 rev A and BSP/52/101 rev B received on 21 May 2015. ) therewith and approved by the Local Planning Authority, or as shall have been otherwise agreed in writing by the Local Planning Authority before the building is used.
Condition : 3 - The materials to be used in the construction of the external surfaces of the extension hereby permitted shall match those used in the existing building.

Condition : 4 - 4.	The extension herby permitted shall not be occupied at any time other than for purposes incidental to the residential use of the dwelling known as 52 Hibernia Gardens, Hounslow, TW3 3SD and the outbuilding hereby permitted shall not be used as habitable accommodation.
Condition : 5 - No doors shall be inserted into the rear elevation of the outbuilding hereby approved.
description: Erection of a single storey outbuilding in rear garden of the house.
